artist: Artist: After Hans Holbein the Younger; Engraver: Conrad Martin Metz
description: Portrait of John Poines facing right and looking right in 3/4 profile; wearing cloak and high white collar with lace edge; cap; hair above collar length; on a pink tinted background
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black: [JOHN POINES/ from the original drawing by Hans Holbein   C. Metz sculp\'t]; on verso red stamp: [(crown) R/ CH..ON/ 54 ...AINED]
title: Portrait of John Poines
